response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Let It Be” DTS-HD MA
response.overview: A Historic Farewell. Experience the poignant sound of The Beatles’ final studio album, “Let It Be,” with the unparalleled clarity of DTS-HD Master Audio 7.1 Surround mix on Blu-ray. Released in 1970, this album captures the band’s raw emotions and musical brilliance during a turbulent period. Featuring iconic tracks like “Let It Be,” “The Long and Winding Road,” and “Get Back,” this album is a testament to The Beatles’ enduring legacy.  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every note and harmony is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.  Rediscover “Let It Be” and immerse yourself in the album that marked the end of an era.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Let It Be” DTS-HD MA
